name: Argon Swamp
storyline:
Exoplanet WS 905613!
The atmosphere is thick, and choked with spores, but worth many times its weight in gold. Large calcified structures permeating the marshes of this planet are able to emit signals in a surprising array of spectrums, and included in the Walking Simulator A Month club for further study by our R&D teams to see if they can yield breakthroughs in communications technolgy. Communicating with tomb-ships can prove difficult given that there is nothing but equidistant protons at absolute zero in every direction in a nearly infinite distance.
